concept.title: Generating DITA from Documents (Word-to-DITA Transformation Framework)
concept.shortdesc: The DITA for Publishers Word-to-DITA framework is packaged as an Open Toolkit plugin.

keywords.indexterm: Word-to-DITA transformation frameworkOpen Toolkit plugin for

conbody.p: The Word-to-DITA transformation framework enables reliable generation of DITA maps and topics from styled Word documents. See for details. It can be used as a standalone XSLT transform or can be run against Word documents using the Open Toolkit.
